alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 2:14PM MST until December 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 8 inches, heaviest in the western Denver suburbs. * WHERE...Boulder and the western suburbs of Denver. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick roads resulting in slow and hazardous travel. The hazardous conditions could impact the late pm commute, and more likely travel this evening through the overnight hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County
